description: the attribute namespace of ExtendedServerAttributes in nova v3 api should be "http://docs.openstack.org/compute/ext/extended_server_attributes/api/v3" , should not be "http://docs.openstack.org/compute/ext/ExtendedServerAttributes/api/v3"
title: the name style is wrong in the nova v3 api extended_server_attributes namespace

comments.content: the attribute namespace of ExtendedServerAttributes in nova v3 api should be "http://docs.openstack.org/compute/ext/extended_server_attributes/api/v3" , should not be "http://docs.openstack.org/compute/ext/ExtendedServerAttributes/api/v3"
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ivan-zhu
